message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper presents a deterministic algorithm for Russian inflection, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the following arXiv CS sub-categories: 

- cs.CL (Computation and Language): This sub-category deals with natural language processing, which is the main focus of this paper. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The algorithm presented in this paper involves machine learning techniques, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): As mentioned earlier, the algorithm presented in this paper involves machine learning techniques, which makes it relevant to this sub-category. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval): The web-service www.passare.ru mentioned in the abstract involves information retrieval, which is a sub-field of this category. 
- cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing): Although the paper does not explicitly mention the use of neural or evolutionary computing, these techniques are often used in natural language processing and machine learning, which are the main focus of this paper. Therefore, it is possible that this paper could be relevant to this sub-category as well.
